projects.title: Neon Dodger
projects.tagline: A fast little arcade game built with pure JavaScript.
projects.description: A keyboard-controlled browser game with collision detection, scoring, difficulty scaling, and a restart loop. Built without frameworks to focus on DOM, events, timing, and state.

images.alt: Neon Dodger title screen with a glowing player icon and score panel
Gameplay showing obstacles, score, and remaining lives

projects.title: ReelFinder
projects.tagline: Search, filter, and favorite movies in React.
projects.description: A React app that consumes a movie API, supports search and filters, shows detail pages, and persists favorites. Focus on components, state, routing, and async fetching.

images.alt: ReelFinder home page with a movie search bar and poster grid
Movie detail page with poster, rating, cast list, and favorite button

projects.title: Daily Byte
projects.description: A layout-focused project with hero, featured stories, categories, and a responsive grid. Emphasis on typography, spacing, and mobile-first design.

images.alt: Daily Byte landing page with hero headline and featured stories grid
Mobile layout showing stacked story cards and a hamburger menu

projects.title: Portfolio API + Views
projects.tagline: A data-driven portfolio powered by Node, Express, and MongoDB.
projects.description: Server-rendered portfolio pages backed by MongoDB. Projects load from the database, detail pages use slugs, and an admin route supports basic CRUD for entries.

images.alt: Portfolio home showing project cards rendered from MongoDB data
Admin screen with project create/edit form and validation messages

projects.title: Cartonaut
projects.tagline: A mini e-commerce site with cart and checkout flow.
projects.description: Product listing, product details, cart management, and a mock checkout. Focus on reusable UI components, state management, and basic validation.

images.alt: Cartonaut product grid with filters and a cart badge in the header
Cart page with line items, quantity controls, and order summary

projects.title: Containerized Notes API
projects.tagline: A small API shipped like a grown-up.
projects.description: A Node/Express REST API for notes with environment-based config and a Dockerized dev/prod setup. Built to practice deployment-thinking: ports, env vars, and repeatable builds.

images.alt: Terminal output showing docker compose running the API service
API documentation page showing endpoints and example responses
